string1: This Application Is Build On Blockchain So That You Can Get 100% Security Across Websites & Applications With Single App.
string2: Add, Generate, Store, Transfer, Sync, Export & Copy All Your Passwords In Single Click. Use Autofill For Quick Action Without Opening App.
title: Frictionless Security
name: Name
addpasswordtoshowdata: Add a Password Now ,And it Will Appear Here.
aboutApp:
The application contains many features, such as logging in using the phone number only 
And the Firestore database. The user registers, and then a database is created containing the user’s data (name, number, and passwords that will be created). The user can create a password by writing it or have the application create a password for him, and he can choose the length of the password or if it contains Letters, numbers, or even symbols
At the bottom, an indicator appears that expresses the strength of the password
The application also contains a page that shows all passwords in a way that is easily accessible
And another page to search for the password using the username or website 
Another page shows all passwords and their strength and shows the working status of all passwords
And some other features
